recommend_reload.title: Page Reload Recommended
recommend_reload.body: Some resources were forcibly blocked because the page was hidden while it loaded. Reload the page if it isn't functioning as expected.
first_visit.title: First Visit
first_visit.body: All resources are blocked because this is the first time you've visited this {0}.
special.canvas_data_url.prompt: This page may be attempting to use canvas fingerprinting to track you. If there is an image displayed that looks suspicious or out of place, click Cancel. If there isn't, use your best judgement.
special.canvas_data_url.prompt_old: This page may be attempting to use canvas fingerprinting to identify you. If this is unexpected and you are not on a site you trust, click Cancel.
special.canvas_data_url.subsequent: Subsequent attempts from {0} will be handled automatically.
special.canvas_data_url.subsequent_sessi: Subsequent attempts from {0} will be handled automatically until you restart Safari.
user_script.add_prompt: Do you want to add this user script to JavaScript Blocker?
user_script.add_success: User script successfully added to JavaScript Blocker.
